Gryffindor.way: You follow him up a grand staircase, your footsteps echoing against the stone walls...
Gryffindor.description: You enter a warm common room, decorated in red and gold. A fire crackles in the fireplace, and students laugh together on the sofas.
Gryffindor.greetings: Students cheer loudly, their courage and energy filling the air.
Gryffindor.installation_message: Bravery and determination are your companions. Welcome to the proud House of Gryffindor.

Slytherin.way: You descend into the cool dungeons, the air heavy with mystery...
Slytherin.description: You discover a vaulted common room, illuminated by the green glow of the lake. Students watch you with curiosity and respect.
Slytherin.greetings: Students watch you with curiosity and respect, their ambition palpable.
Slytherin.installation_message: Cunning and ambition are your allies. Welcome to the noble House of Slytherin.

Hufflepuff.way: You are guided through cozy corridors near the kitchens...
Hufflepuff.description: You enter a cozy room, with walls covered in plants and magical herbs. The atmosphere is peaceful and welcoming.
Hufflepuff.greetings: Students welcome you with kindness and laughter, offering food and friendship.
Hufflepuff.installation_message: Patience and hard work are your greatest strengths. Welcome to the friendly House of Hufflepuff.

Ravenclaw.way: You climb a spiral staircase that seems endless...
Ravenclaw.description: You arrive in a bright room, filled with books and enchanted maps. Discussions are already underway about Professor Flitwick's next riddle.
Ravenclaw.greetings: Students greet you with thoughtful smiles, eager for intellectual debate.
Ravenclaw.installation_message: Wisdom and curiosity will guide you. Welcome to the scholars of Ravenclaw.
